input.sentences: christmas celebrations were in full gear .
the streets were decorated and people were out enjoying the holiday season .
there were ice sculptures to look at on the side of the road .
there was even a chance to meet [male] !
output.sentences: It was time for a Christmas celebration.
In the streets, people celebrated the Christmas season.
They looked at cool ice sculptures in the road.
The revelers ate and drank delicious refreshments.
There was even a guy dressed up as a reindeer.
